title: Aave Companies Acquires Sonar
description: Aave Companies, the software technology company that builds web3 protocols, applications and tools, announced today the acquisition of Sonar, a San Francisco-based startup that developed the first social mobile metaverse where players can build worlds and interact with user-created spaces using NFTs.
